jd: From: Gurpreet, Absolute IT gurpreet@absoluting.com Reply to: gurpreet@absoluting.com Job DescriptionNotes:Candidate MUST be Local in the AreaRequires Onsite for at least 2-3 days a weekProof of location is required to submit. No digital bill printed! – Real time proof or I will pass.Candidate must have an active and an updated LinkedIn ID with a picture and current location updated (REQUIRED!!)Client: AtosPosition: Sr. Snowflake ConsultantLocation: Malvern, PALength: 6+ monthsShift: Onsite/HybridJob Description:Relevant Experience8-10+ yearsTechnical/Functional Skills:Should have Development experience in Snowflake.Exp. in data Migration from legacy DWH system to Cloud Snowflake.Partner with the Reporting manager to identify, analyze and document new business requirements and translate them to reporting & analytics requirement specifications.Design, Develop, Test and Migrate Database Objects (tables, Views , Procedures) from Oracle DB to Snowflake.Familiar with DW Concepts , Oracle DB and ETL tools.Complete design understanding and assist with developing, documenting and performing system and user acceptance tests.Good to HaveSnowflake Certification Experience Required Snowflake DBA experience in data migration from Oracle to Snowflake.At least one end to end implementation experience to implement data migration.Strong problem solving and analytical skillsRoles & Responsibilities Ability to lever Roll Outs/Support independently as Snowflake consultant.Control all requirement gathering, solution design configuration, developments, and Functional Specification delivery related to all competencies mentioned above.
